description: This file contains internal function declarations and data structures related to ASN.1 objects for handling X.509 certificate revocation lists (CRLs) and related entities, specifically for ASN.1 encoding/decoding and validation within a cryptographic library.
external_files: Related include files (not specified but implied), generally ASN.1 handling libraries, cryptographic key libraries

classes.name: ANSC_ASN1_CRL
classes.description: Represents the ASN.1 structure for X.509 Certificate Revocation List, including functions for creating, decoding, verifying, and managing CRLs.

classes.name: ANSC_ASN1_TBSCERTLIST
classes.description: Represents the TBSCertList ASN.1 structure within the CRL, with functions for creation and validation.

classes.name: ANSC_ASN1_REVOKEDCERTIFICATE
classes.description: Represents individual revoked certificate entries in the CRL.

classes.name: ANSC_ASN1_REVOKEDCERTIFICATES
classes.description: Represents a sequence of revoked certificates.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLCreateChildAttr
methods.description: Creates attribute for a child object of CRL.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetChildName
methods.description: Retrieves the name of a child element of CRL.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLCreateChildObject
methods.description: Creates a child object for CRL.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetTbsCertList
methods.description: Gets the TBSCertList part of the CRL.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetSigatureAlgorithm
methods.description: Retrieves the signature algorithm used.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetSignature
methods.description: Retrieves the CRL signature.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLFree
methods.description: Frees the memory associated with the CRL object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLBeforeDecodingChild
methods.description: Hook before decoding a child element.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLAfterDecodingChild
methods.description: Hook after decoding a child element.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLAfterDecoding
methods.description: Hook after decoding the entire CRL.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetIssuerHandle
methods.description: Retrieves the issuer info handle.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetThisUpdateTime
methods.description: Gets the 'thisUpdate' time.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetNextUpdateTime
methods.description: Gets the 'nextUpdate' time.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLVerify
methods.description: Verifies the CRL signature using a public key.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLIsCertRevoked
methods.description: Checks if a certificate with given serial number is revoked.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLEnumRevokedCert
methods.description: Enumerates revoked certificates with a callback.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLGetSignatureType
methods.description: Gets the type of signature used.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CRLIsCRLExpired
methods.description: Checks if the CRL has expired.

methods.name: AnscAsn1TBSCertListCreateChildAttr
methods.description: Creates attribute for a child of TBSCertList.

methods.name: AnscAsn1TBSCertListGetChildName
methods.description: Retrieves the name of a child of TBSCertList.

methods.name: AnscAsn1TBSCertListCreateChildObject
methods.description: Creates a child object for TBSCertList.

methods.name: AnscAsn1RevokedCertificateCreateChildAttr
methods.description: Creates attribute for revoked certificate entry.

methods.name: AnscAsn1RevokedCertificateGetChildName
methods.description: Retrieves the name of a revoked certificate's child element.

methods.name: AnscAsn1RevokedCertificateCreateChildObject
methods.description: Creates a revoked certificate child object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1RevokedCertificatesIsChildValid
methods.description: Validates a revoked certificates child object.

methods.name: AnscAsn1RevokedCertificatesCreateChild
methods.description: Creates a child revoked certificates object.
